name: get_user_posts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool get_9gag_api_detailed.
Tool description: Detailed 9GAG API. Scraping posts, categories, users. Includes download videos/photos.
API description: Fetches posts for a specified user from the 9gag API.

username.description: The username of the 9gag user whose posts are to be fetched.

counter.description: leave blank for first request. For subsequent requests, send the counter and after parameter you got from the previous request.

after.description: leave blank for first request. For subsequent requests, send the counter and after parameter you got from the previous request.
